price: Hakika kilimpitia binaadamu kipindi katika zama ambacho kwamba hakuwa kitu kinacho tajwa.
arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ حِينٞ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهۡرِ لَمۡ يَكُن شَيۡـٔٗا مَّذۡكُورًا
footnotes: Hakika kimempitia mwanaadamu kipindi cha zama kabla hajapuliziwa roho, naye hata bado hakuwa ni kitu cha kutajika kwa jina lake, wala hajuulikani nini atakuwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: hal atā ʿalā al-insāni ḥīnun mina al-dahri lam yakun shayan madhkūran
